DOC.brief_summary: This single center , non comparison clinical trial . Fifty study patient Symfony IOL implant dominant eye +3,25D Tecnis Multifocal non-dominant eye . The investigator evaluate vision distance , intermediate near well assess patient satisfaction spectacle independence .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Visual Performance Combining Symfony IOL +3.25 Tecnis Multifocal IOL
DOC.detailed_description: Each study patient undergo routine cataract extraction procedure eye . In dominant eye Tecnis Symfony IOL implant non dominant eye , Tecnis +3.25D Multifocal implant . The surgery within 2 day . Every patient receive postoperative instruction medication . The aim investigate potential benefit implant two different IOL 's give patient wider range near vision decrease risk haloing glare enable less dependent reading glass
DOC.criteria: good general health , willing comply study instruction , Visual potential 20/30 good , less 1.5D corneal astigmatism , normal macula , clear lens cataract , pupil size great 3.5mm known pathology affect visual outcome , amblyopia strabismus , pupil abnormality , zonule problem , keratoconus , prior ocular surgery , use medication could affect vision , uncontrolled systemic disease
